reliability.title: Circuit Breaker Pattern
reliability.description: Add circuit breaker for GitHub API to prevent cascade failures when API is down. Open circuit after N failures, auto-close after timeout.
reliability.impact: Prevents system from hammering failed APIs, improves resilience

reliability.title: Deployment Health Checks
reliability.description: After deployment, automatically check if application is healthy (HTTP 200, response time < threshold). Auto-rollback on health check failure.
reliability.impact: Prevents broken deployments from staying live

reliability.title: Deployment Status Polling
reliability.description: Poll deployment platform APIs to get real-time deployment status instead of fire-and-forget. Track progress and completion.
reliability.impact: Better visibility into deployment progress, ability to wait for completion

monitoring_observability.title: Structured Logging with Context
monitoring_observability.description: Replace console.log with structured logging (Pino/Winston). Include requestId, userId, operation, duration, errors in all logs.

monitoring_observability.title: Metrics Collection (Prometheus)
monitoring_observability.description: Add Prometheus metrics for: API request count, latency (p50/p95/p99), error rates, deployment success rate, GitHub API call count, workflow completion time.

monitoring_observability.title: Deployment Dashboard
monitoring_observability.description: Create dashboard showing: deployment history, success rate, average deployment time, rollback frequency, repository activity.

cost_optimization.title: API Cost Tracking
cost_optimization.description: Track costs for GitHub API calls, Grok API usage, deployment platform costs. Display in dashboard, alert on budget thresholds.
cost_optimization.impact: Cost visibility, budget control, optimization opportunities

cost_optimization.title: Smart Deployment Target Selection
cost_optimization.description: Choose deployment platform based on cost, latency, availability. Prefer Vercel for Next.js, Railway for databases, AWS for scale.

workflow_enhancements.title: Workflow State Persistence
workflow_enhancements.description: Save workflow progress in database (Prisma). Enable resuming interrupted workflows, viewing workflow history, cancellation.
workflow_enhancements.impact: Workflow reliability, ability to resume after failures

workflow_enhancements.title: Workflow Templates
workflow_enhancements.description: Pre-configured workflow templates (Next.js starter, React app, Node API, etc.). Users select template and customize description.

workflow_enhancements.title: Workflow Cancellation
workflow_enhancements.description: Allow cancelling long-running workflows. Stop all in-progress operations, clean up resources, update status.

workflow_enhancements.title: Workflow Progress Webhooks
workflow_enhancements.description: Send webhook notifications on workflow events (start, step complete, success, failure). Enable external integrations.

security_improvements.title: Token Rotation Mechanism
security_improvements.description: Automatically rotate GitHub/Vercel tokens periodically. Validate token expiration, refresh before expiry, notify on failures.

security_improvements.title: Secrets Management Integration
security_improvements.description: Integrate with AWS Secrets Manager, HashiCorp Vault, or Azure Key Vault for secure token storage instead of env vars.

security_improvements.title: Input Sanitization Audit
security_improvements.description: Review all user inputs for SQL injection, XSS, path traversal. Ensure all file paths are validated, all strings are escaped.
files_to_modify: All API routes (audit existing Zod schemas)

security_improvements.title: Request Signing/Verification
security_improvements.description: Add request signing for webhooks (HMAC). Verify GitHub webhook signatures, Vercel deployment webhooks.

performance_optimizations.title: Deployment Queue System
performance_optimizations.description: Queue deployments instead of running concurrently. Prevent overload, ensure sequential deployments per repo, retry failed items.
performance_optimizations.impact: Prevent deployment conflicts, better resource management

performance_optimizations.title: Batch File Operations
performance_optimizations.description: Batch multiple file writes into single commit instead of individual commits. Reduces API calls, faster operations.
performance_optimizations.impact: Reduced GitHub API calls, faster workflows

performance_optimizations.title: Caching Layer
performance_optimizations.description: Cache repository metadata, file trees, deployment status. Use Redis for distributed caching. TTL-based invalidation.
performance_optimizations.impact: Reduced API calls, faster response times

developer_experience.title: OpenAPI/Swagger Documentation
developer_experience.description: Generate OpenAPI spec for all API routes. Auto-document from Zod schemas, provide interactive Swagger UI.

developer_experience.title: Integration Tests Suite
developer_experience.description: E2E tests for full workflow: description → repo → code → deploy. Test rollback, retry logic, error handling.

developer_experience.title: Environment Variable Validation on Startup
developer_experience.description: Validate all required env vars on application startup. Fail fast with clear error messages if missing.
developer_experience.impact: Prevent runtime failures, clearer error messages

advanced_features.title: Multi-Repository Workflows
advanced_features.description: Support workflows that create and manage multiple repositories (monorepo, microservices). Coordinate cross-repo changes.

advanced_features.title: CI/CD Pipeline Generation
advanced_features.description: Auto-generate GitHub Actions workflows, GitLab CI configs, or CircleCI configs based on project type.

advanced_features.title: Blue-Green Deployment Support
advanced_features.description: Implement blue-green deployments: deploy to staging first, health check, then switch traffic. Zero-downtime rollback.

next_steps: Start with quick wins (env validation, deployment status polling). Then focus on reliability (circuit breaker, health checks). Finally add advanced features based on usage patterns.
